510700.reference:
Reference  : Muwatta Malik 510700
In-book reference  : Book 26, Hadith 700
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 26, Hadith 700
510700.text: Yahya related to me from Zayd ibn Aslam from a man of the Banu Damra that his father said, "The Messenger of Allah, may Allah bless him and grant him peace, was asked about the Aqiqa. He said, 'I do not like disobedience (uquq),' as if he disliked the name. He said, 'If anyone has a child born to him, and wants to sacrifice for his child, then let him do it.' "

510710.reference:
Reference  : Muwatta Malik 510710
In-book reference  : Book 26, Hadith 710
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 26, Hadith 710
510710.text: Yahya related to me from Malik from Jafar ibn Muhammad that his father said, "Fatima, the daughter of the Messenger of Allah, may Allah bless him and grant him peace, weighed the hair of Hasan, Husayn, Zaynab and Umm Kulthum, and gave away in sadaqa an equivalent weight of silver."

510720.reference:
Reference  : Muwatta Malik 510720
In-book reference  : Book 26, Hadith 720
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 26, Hadith 720
510720.text: Yahya related to me from Malik from Rabia ibn Abi Abd ar-Rahman that Muhammad ibn Ali ibn al-Husayn said, "Fatima, the daughter of the Messenger of Allah, may Allah bless him and grant him peace, weighed the hair of Hasan and Husayn, and gave away in sadaqa the equivalent weight in silver."

510730.reference:
Reference  : Muwatta Malik 510730
In-book reference  : Book 26, Hadith 730
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 26, Hadith 730
510730.text: Yahya related to me from Malik from Nafi that if any of Abdullah ibn Umar's family asked him for an aqiqa, he would give it to them. He gave a sheep as aqiqa for both his male and female children.

510740.reference:
Reference  : Muwatta Malik 510740
In-book reference  : Book 26, Hadith 740
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 26, Hadith 740
510740.text: Yahya related to me from Malik from Rabia ibn Abi Abd ar-Rahman that Muhammad ibn Ibrahim ibn al-Harith at-Taymi said, "I heard my father say that the aqiqa was desirable, even if it was only a sparrow."

510750.reference:
Reference  : Muwatta Malik 510750
In-book reference  : Book 26, Hadith 750
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 26, Hadith 750
510750.text: Yahya related to me from Malik that he heard that there had been an aqiqa for Hasan and Husayn, the sons of Ali ibn Abi Talib.

510760.reference:
Reference  : Muwatta Malik 510760
In-book reference  : Book 26, Hadith 760
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 26, Hadith 760
510760.text: Yahya related to me from Malik from Hisham ibn Urwa that his father, Urwa ibn az-Zubayr made an aqiqa for his male and female children of a sheep each.
